author: bnicholes
msg: Changed stub from returning APR_SUCCESS to APR_ENOTIMPL until we
can figure out how to implement these functions.

author: bjh
msg: OS/2: in apr_stat(), fill in finfo->name if it's asked for.

author: bnicholes
msg: NetWare user and group info functions

author: trawick
msg: fix some return codes from apr lock create; we were looking at errno
*after* calling the cleanup routine, which really sucks since the cleanup
routine may have made a failing syscall; thus the real error wouldn't
example: apr_lock_create() specifying a file which already exists
old retcode: EBADF     (errno from unnecessary close() in lock cleanup)

author: trawick
msg: include the prototype for apr_unix_setup_time() in the file
that defines apr_unix_setup_time() to ensure consistency
(and to eliminate a gcc warning to that effect)
